forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. High 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning becoming less numerous during the afternoon hours. High 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 7C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
